channel.title: Banana Chan talk "How To Get Started Writing In Games" 10/11 @ 12PM EDT
channel.description: Banana Chan [@bananachangames](https://twitter.com/bananachangames), co-designer of the forthcoming (super exciting) Jiangshi: Blood in the Banquet Hall rpg, is giving a FREE talk on "How To Get Started Writing In Games" on October 11 at 12:00 EDT. It's a great opportunity to learn more about writing games from someone who's worked on board games and ttrpgs. It will be livestreamed and archived on [@TabletopNet](https://twitter.com/TabletopNet)'s YouTube channel, which you can find here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9xzgzLnk0rcl7Ygc6Mi69Q. Hopefully the Gauntlet can invite Banana Chan to run games & give talks at future online events! Until then, check her out on 10/11!

item.title: Banana Chan talk "How To Get Started Writing In Games" 10/11 @ 12PM EDT
item.dc:creator: @Larry_S
item.description:
@Larry_S wrote:

Banana Chan @bananachangames, co-designer of the forthcoming (super exciting) Jiangshi: Blood in the Banquet Hall rpg, is giving a FREE talk on “How To Get Started Writing In Games” on October 11 at 12:00 EDT. It’s a great opportunity to learn more about writing games from someone who’s worked on board games and ttrpgs. It will be livestreamed and archived on @TabletopNet’s YouTube channel, which you can find here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9xzgzLnk0rcl7Ygc6Mi69Q. Hopefully the Gauntlet can invite Banana Chan to run games & give talks at future online events! Until then, check her out on 10/11!
